snippet.title: Shadowveil: Legend of the Five Rings - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2536960/Shadowveil_Legend_of_The_Five_Rings/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=revealtrailer

In the first-ever video game set in the world of Legend of the Five Rings, you play as the commander,
guiding your expedition’s journey through the Shadowlands. You’ll need to strategically plan your
objectives, decide who to recruit and how to specialize the samurai under your command, and figure
out the most potent configuration of items and abilities if you hope to survive.

Shadowveil is a strategic roguelite game that combines RPG-like unit development, powerful card effects, and exciting tactical combat for a new type of legendary adventure. Form a party of Crab Clan samurai and pit them against the dangers of the Shadowlands to earn experience and unlock new cards that represent items and abilities. Return to camp between runs to heal up, train units, and unlock powerful new combinations in preparation for the next adventure. The Shadowlands will push you to your limits and beyond, and there is no shame in retreating to camp to recuperate.

Before you set out on your next run, you’re able to gain valuable combat experience and curry favor with influential individuals, permanently increase your party's strength, learn from your mistakes and increase your skill and power to survive increasingly dangerous expeditions. Each session will be unique and provide challenging dynamic gameplay that keeps you on your toes and coming back for just one more run.

So don your armor, grab your tetsubō, and say a prayer to your ancestors as you prepare to embark on a perilous journey. 
Add Shadowveil: Legend of the Five Rings to your Steam wishlist today! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2536960/Shadowveil_Legend_of_The_Five_Rings/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=revealtrailer
